In the English and German SRDs, this spell references the name of a rule that was removed after the original DnDNext playtest. In English the wording of this reference in the Round 5-10 rules is: "The wind and rain count as a severe distraction for the purposes of maintaining concentration on spells." The rule for "severe distractions" still exists, it just doesn't have a specific name. You can find it in the section on concentration, it's the last paragraph there.
